# Class RuntimeData

Factory class for creating data objects with proper _inworldTag values. Provides type-safe constructors for all supported data types.

##### Index

### Methods

createAudio createClassificationResult createError createGoalAdvancement createJson createKnowledgeRecords createListToolsResponseData createLLMChatRequest createLLMChatResponse createLLMCompletionResponse createMatchedIntents createMatchedKeywords createMemoryState createSafetyResult createText createToolCallData createToolData createTTSOutput getTag isAudio isClassificationResult isError isGoalAdvancement isJson isKnowledgeRecords isListToolsResponseData isLLMChatRequest isLLMChatResponse isLLMCompletionResponse isMatchedIntents isMatchedKeywords isMemoryState isSafetyResult isText isToolCallData isToolData isTTSOutput isValidTaggedData

## Methods

### `Static`createAudio

  * createAudio(waveform: Float32Array, sampleRate: number): AudioData

Creates an Audio data object

#### Parameters

    * waveform: Float32Array

Audio waveform data

    * sampleRate: number

Audio sample rate

#### Returns AudioData

### `Static`createLLMChatRequest

  * createLLMChatRequest(  
messages: {  
content:  
| string  
| {  
detail?: string;  
text?: string;  
type: "image"  
| "text";  
url?: string;  
}[];  
role: string;  
toolCallId?: string;  
toolCalls?: { args: string; id: string; name: string }[];  
}[],  
tools?: { description: string; name: string; properties: string }[],  
toolChoice?: {  
function?: { name: string; type: string };  
type: string;  
value?: string;  
},  
): LLMChatRequestData

Creates an LLM Chat Request data object

#### Parameters

    * messages: {  
content:  
| string  
| { detail?: string; text?: string; type: "image"  
| "text"; url?: string }[];  
role: string;  
toolCallId?: string;  
toolCalls?: { args: string; id: string; name: string }[];  
}[]

Chat messages

    * `Optional`tools: { description: string; name: string; properties: string }[]

Optional tools

    * `Optional`toolChoice: { function?: { name: string; type: string }; type: string; value?: string }

Optional tool choice

#### Returns LLMChatRequestData
